name: MEDIAPRODUCCION, S.LU.
goal: The MEDIAPRO Group is the leading technical services supplier to the audiovisual sector. The company produces and distributes audiovisual content, administers and distributes sporting events, is a film and interactive content producer and supplier of post-production services. The following services also constitute a fundamental part of the MEDIAPRO Group's activities: technical engineering, transmission services, communications and marketing consultancy and advertising trading as well as the design and post-production services for themed television channels. The staff and technical resources at MEDIAPRO are spearheading innovation within the European audiovisual sector.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Copyright, spectrum, AV legislation, labour law, e-commerce, online platforms, data protection, Digital Single Market, culture, sports
